name: Lit Protocol
description: Lit Protocol is a decentralized key management and private compute network. Lit provides developers building in Web3 with three core primitives: - Decentralized Signing and Wallet Management (support for ECDSA and EdDSA signatures) via MPC TSS + TEEs - Decentralized Encryption / Decryption (identity-based BLS encryption scheme) via MPC TSS + TEEs - Private Compute executed via Litâ€™s MPC TSS network and protected by sealed TEEs
